Baldur's.Gate.Duology.Enhanced.Edition.Repack-R.G.Mechanics


Baldur's Gate: Enhanced Edition

Year: 2012
Genre: RPG / Isometric
Developer: Overhaul Games
Publisher: Beamdog
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng  |Rus  | Multi10
Voice Language: Eng
Crack: PROPHET

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP (32-Bit), Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
Processor: Intel Pentium 4 @ 1Ghz
Memory: 512 MB
Video card: GeForce 2 MX400 or greater
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX  9.0
Free space on hard disk: 2 GB

Description:

Baldur's Gate: Enhanced Edition - remake of the legendary RPG, published in 1998. 
In the structure of the publication came addition Baldur's Gate: Tales of the Sword 
Coast, a new scene content, quests, and members of the squad.

Features repack

Baldur's Gate: Enhanced Edition
Version of the game - v1.0.2014
Do not cut / recoded


Baldur's Gate II: Enhanced Edition


Year: 2013
Genre: RPG / Isometric
Developer: Overhaul Games
Publisher: Beamdog
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng  |Rus
Voice Language: Eng
Crack: RELOADED

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP (32-Bit), Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
Processor: Intel Pentium 4 @ 1Ghz
Memory: 1 GB
Video Card: 512MB Video Card using Shader Model 3 or higher
/ AMD Radion HD 2900 GT or NVIDIA GeForce 9500 GT or better
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX  9.0
Free space on hard drive: 3 GB

Description:

Revised edition of Baldur's Gate II includes the original game and the addition of Throne of Bhaal. 
The game will be four new characters, ready to join the squad player, as well as three dozen new 
locations. Furthermore, Beamdog prepared test The Black Pits 2: Gladiators of Thay, whose 
members descend into the deep dungeon, where they wait for the trap strong opponents and 
valuable trophies. Among other innovations is the support of a wide mode, arts and updated interface.

Features repack

Baldur's Gate II: Enhanced Edition
Version of the game - v1.2.2030
Do not cut / recoded
